page.title: 08Games
page.content: At school we have 3 playtimes.During the morning and afternoon breaks I play football.At lunchtime I play cricket.On Tuesdays and Thursdays we have P.E. in which we play 'had' and we do exercises.In the summer the children who have packed lunch play tennis with their lunchboxes and a bat.Also,I like to play with my electronic games.I've got 4 electronic games.My favourite is Starforce.I will tell you about it.The game has seven phases.You have nine lives in the first phase.The enemy come down and you have to try and shoot them,but watchout they might shoot you.The game gets harder from one phase to the next.My other games are called Skyfighter,Juggler and King Kong New York.Electronic games are very exciting. By Jatinder Chaggar
